3: I'm done here.
I've picked out all the largest women's clothing... Now we just have to wait for Murray to contact us.
Yep.
Which reminds me, I'm surprised you were able to keep your curiosity at bay and refrain from asking Murray about Lee. Almost thought you were an imposter.
I'm real curious, but I still have some common sense. I know what to ask and what not to.
After all, that Murray... is probably what spurs Lee on.
If only you were normally this smart. Come to think of it, so what spurs you on? When Wanshi and the others asked you about it last time, you kept stuttering.
I'll keep stuttering, then. After all, that fella's the one who has the say when it comes to this topic.
So who has the say? Camu?
Shh, let' not wake him.
When Chrome mentions Camu, Kamui gestures at him to shush.
Anyway, there's no point in sitting here waiting. How about I try it on for size first?
It's... probably not as hard as we think it is. I've seen similar clothes. Sit down first, Kamui.
Like this?
Don't move. First, let's fit your head through this hole in the dress...
Wait a sec, Captain! My Inver-Device is stuck!
...Just hold your head up and arch your back a bit. And now let me pull the back zipper up.
Ow! My back, Chrome!
It's already the biggest one we can find. Try to keep it down.
Pant... pant...
When Murray finally returns, what greets him is a messy heap made of clothes and two Strike Hawk members.
Uh, what were you guys doing?
Changing into clothes... is a different beast than combat.
Judging from the traumatic situation, the two must have battled with a Leviathan. Murray thinks so while sending the materials he prepared to Chrome.
Anyway, I'll handle the rest. Can we dress Kamui again and put makeup on him under my orders?
Got it... Stand up, Kamui.
I'm beginning to hate this already...
It's too late to say that now, Kamui...
Huh?
